#include <iostream>
#include <cstring>
#include <cstdio>
using namespace std;
 
 
int main()
{
  int t;
  scanf("%d",&t);
  while(t--){
    int n,m;
    scanf("%d%d",&n,&m);
    int *arr=new int[n+1];
    for (int i=0;i<m;i++)
    {   int p,q,k;
    scanf("%d%d%d",&p,&q,&k);
      arr[p]+=k;
      arr[q+1]-=k;
    }
    int sum=0;
    for (int i = 0; i < n; ++i)
    {
      sum=sum+arr[i];
      arr[i]=sum;
    }
    int s;
    scanf("%d",&s);
    for(int i=0;i<s;i++)
    {
        int temp;
        scanf("%d",&temp);
          printf("%d\n",arr[temp]);
    }
 }
}
